      • print

        public void print(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                  int mode,
                  int interval)
        打印图片
        print pciture
        Specified by:
        print in interface IPrinter
        Parameters:
        bitmap - 要打印的图片
        picture for printing
        mode(0,1,32,33) - 点图格式:
        picture format:
        模式 水平比例 垂直比例
        format horizontal scale vertical scale
        0: 8 点单密度 ×2 ×3
        0: 8 point single density ×2 ×3
        1: 8 点双密度 ×1 ×3
        1: 8 point dual density ×1 ×3
        32:24 点单密度 ×2 ×1
        32:24 point single density ×2 ×1
        33:24 点双密度 ×1 ×1
        33:24 point dual density ×1 ×1

        public void setPrintRowSpacing(int spacing)

        Setup line spacing (if the set value is less than max.charater height, then the line spacing equals to max.character height)
        Specified by:
        setPrintRowSpacing in interface IPrinter
        Parameters:
        spacing - (0 ≤ spacing ≤ 255), 默认值33
        spacing (0≤ spacing ≤ 255), default 33

        public void setBarcodeHRI(int position)
        设置一维条码可读字符（HRI）打印位置
        *setup 1D barcode readable character (HRI) print position
        Specified by:
        setBarcodeHRI in interface IPrinter
        Parameters:
        position(0-3) - 默认是0; [0:不打印, 1: 条码的上方 , 2:条码的下方, 3:条码的上方和下方]
        position(0-3) default is 0; [0:not print, 1:barcode up side 2: barcode down side, 3: barcode up and down]
